text: An Innocent Man is a 1989 American crime drama movie directed by Peter Yates and starring Tom Selleck, F. Murray Abraham, Laila Robins, David Rasche, Richard Young, Bruce A. Young, Badja Djola, Todd Graff. It was distributed by Touchstone Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1989 crime drama movies Category:1980s American crime drama movies Category:Movies directed by Peter Yates Category:Movies about miscarriage of justice
title: An Innocent Man (movie)
